dcterms:creator: Ankush Khandelwal
Sahil Swami
Syed S Akhtar
Manish Shrivastava
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 3543 annotated tweets where 1755 are labeled humorous and 1698 are labeled non-humorous, used for evaluating the effectiveness of bilingual word embeddings and proposed deep learning models.
dcterms:title: Benchmark Dataset

dcterms:description: A corpus created using Twitter data, containing around 200k tweets extracted from the 1000 most common words, used for training bilingual word embeddings.
dcterms:title: Twitter Corpus
